main event: On January 2, 1958, two individuals in Huntsville, Alabama, observed a bright, white ball in the sky, which they reported as a UFO.
interesting points: The object was described as brighter than Venus with a variable pulsing or blinking action., The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object was reported to be rapidly accelerating and changed color during its course., The sighting was investigated by the Rocket City Astronomical Association., A conclusion was reached that it was probably a balloon, although it was observed by multiple individuals.
